summary: A white trapper steals a white mustang called "Eagle Wing" from a Kiowa Indian, who pursues him to get his horse back.
cast: Martin Sheen|Sam Waterston|Harvey Keitel|Stéphane Audran|John Castle|Caroline Langrishe|Jorge Russek|Manuel Ojeda|Jorge Luke|Pedro Damián|Claudio Brook|José Carlos Ruiz|Farnesio de Bernal|Cecilia Camacho|Enrique Lucero|Julio Lucena
keywords: native american attack|native american burial|native american burial ground|native american chief|saber
title: Yo, gran cazador
